name: Jai Vaishanavi Mata Education Society Kherda

address: Jai Vaishanavi Mata Education Society, Kherda, At-Kherda,

briefDescription: JVMESK is a registered non-profit organization started in 2010. Solely function on the basis of donations received. Various bigger corporates help us achieving our targets and we as group bring out small shares too. We are working for better rural education cause. We establish Smart Class in rural villages of Maharashtra.We are a group of young working professional who have taken the responsibility of child education, awareness and to empower them by guiding them through various activities for the children and families of Tahasil Pathari, Dist.Parbhani.Our aim is to bring in awareness amongst people about this project so that we can offer best for these children and families of Farmers.
